item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Yea, none of them are “amazing,” but they are decent. I mean its like made in paint. They all have some form of uniqueness to them.

Anyways now that I have Photoshop CS6 and Photoshop Elements 9, I should be getting back into this when I feel like it.
